block.name: Probe MPSK SNR
block.make: gr.probe_mpsk_snr_c($alpha) def _$(id)_run(): while True: time.sleep($update_interval) print "$(id) Signal Mean:", self.$(id).signal_mean() print "$(id) Noise Variance:", self.$(id).noise_variance() print "$(id) SNR:", self.$(id).snr() _$(id)_thread = threading.Thread(target=_$(id)_run) _$(id)_thread.setDaemon(True) _$(id)_thread.start()
